nodes.text: Duran Gorr was a Human male Mandalorian raider who lived doing the Cold War. He led a group of Mandalorians that raided a shipment of Republic warheads. However, both he and his men were killed by Republic forces who came for the warheads. Duran Gorr wore gray Mandalorian armor with white markings, and bone-like tattoos on his face.
Duran Gorr appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the final enemy in the Heroic mission "Fallen Stars" on Taris for Republic players.
